meanings.definition: The quality or state of being compact.
meanings.sent1: The compactnesses of the suitcase made it easy to carry.
meanings.sent2: The compactnesses of the bookshelf allowed it to fit in the small room.
meanings.sent3: The compactnesses of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to put together.
meanings.sent4: The compactnesses of the team's defense prevented any goals from being scored.
meanings.sent5: The compactnesses of the soil made it perfect for planting flowers.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is compact.
meanings.sent1: The high compactnesses of the boxes made them easy to stack.
meanings.sent2: The low compactnesses of the fabric allowed it to flow freely.
meanings.sent3: The unusual compactnesses of the snowflakes puzzled the scientists.
meanings.sent4: The compactnesses of the crowd at the concert made it hard to move.
meanings.sent5: The compactnesses of the ingredients in the recipe ensured a delicious cake.

meanings.definition: The property of being closely and neatly packed together.
meanings.sent1: The compactnesses of the files on the desk made it look organized.
meanings.sent2: The compactnesses of the clothes in the drawer saved space.
meanings.sent3: The playful compactnesses of the kittens in the box were adorable.
meanings.sent4: The compactnesses of the stars in the sky created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The compactnesses of the words on the page made it easy to read.
